attributes.action: increase discipline in prisons through the medium of dance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sudies have shown that an increase in dance has lead to decrease in crime. For example, but in no way only, the Phillipeano prison where all inmates take part in modern dance lessons. Since this was introduced, the Phillipeans are under-going a renaissance in all forms of stuff xxx

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
